argumentText:
ARGUMENT

| Step | Hyp | Ref | Expression |
|---|---|---|---|

| 1 |  | #P_ax-1 | |- ( ( ph -> ps ) -> ( ch -> ( ph -> ps ) ) ) |
| 2 | 1 | #P_a2d | |- ( ( ph -> ps ) -> ( ( ch -> ph ) -> ( ch -> ps ) ) ) |
\
 More direct proof of ~ imim2 .  Note that ~ imim2i and ~ imim2d can be proved as usual from this closed form (i.e. using ~ ax-mp and ~ syl respectively).  (Contributed by BJ, 19-Jul-2019.) (Proof modification is discouraged.)  (New usage is discouraged.)
